name: Forlorn (MedicOnDuty)
description:
You've crash landed on an alien world and must gather fuel to power your craft so you can escape. The good new? The more fuel you can collect before you deposit it in your ship, the more power it will generate. The bad new? It messes with your suit's electronics. Oh, and it'll make the local fauna attack you. Plan carefully, and don't be afraid to risk it all. The only other option is wasting away on an alien world, after all.

CONTROLS

Movement: W, A, S, D

Aim flashlight: Mouse

Toggle flashlight: Left mouse
